    • zeroCapacityNode

      public GlobalConfigurationBuilder zeroCapacityNode(boolean zeroCapacityNode)
      Set the zero capacity node to true to configure a global capacity factor 0.0f for every distributed cache. The node will join the cluster but won't keep data on it. However, this flag does not affect replicated caches. Replicated caches will continue to keep copies of the data in this node. Use only distributed caches to make the best use of this feature.
      Parameters:
      zeroCapacityNode - value, true or false
      Returns:
      GlobalConfigurationBuilder instance
